title: Lumps and Bumps On The Path To Vaccination
itunes:title: Lumps and Bumps On The Path To Vaccination
description:
The government says a slowdown in the vaccine rollout is down to a "lumpy" supply chain, but they are still on course to meet their target of jabs for all U.K. adults by the end of July.

Paul Scully, Conservative MP for Sutton and Cheam, Minister for London and Junior Minister for Small Business, Consumers and Labour Markets tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Roger Hearing it was never going to be a smooth path but it doesn't affect the roadmap.

Plus Joe Twyman, founder of Deltapoll joins to discuss the overwhelming public support for a statutory public inquiry into how the government has handled the pandemic.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
The government says a slowdown in the vaccine rollout is down to a "lumpy" supply chain, but they are still on course to meet their target of jabs for all U.K. adults by the end of July.

Paul Scully, Conservative MP for Sutton and Cheam, Minister for London and Junior Minister for Small Business, Consumers and Labour Markets tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Roger Hearing it was never going to be a smooth path but it doesn't affect the roadmap.

Plus Joe Twyman, founder of Deltapoll joins to discuss the overwhelming public support for a statutory public inquiry into how the government has handled the pandemic.

itunes:author: Bloomberg
